cookie.content: This site uses cookies to improve the user’s experience. In no case will this data be sold to a third party.

header.cookie-content: Ce site utilise des cookies afin d'améliorer l'expérience utilisateur. En aucun cas les données récoltées ne sont revendues à des tiers :

header.browser-desc-3: afin de profiter au mieux de ce site web.

content-bloc-1.title: our Activities
content-bloc-1.app-content: Build new application matching with our business.
content-bloc-1.site-content: Applicant website to increase our wev visibility
content-bloc-1.pack-content: Install startup toolkit : mail, landing page website, share document, CRM...

content-bloc-3.title: our Values
content-bloc-3.text:
ITArverne wants to be a human society where employees thrive in a pleasant environment. We give ourselves the means to effectively train our employees so that they become true technical experts.
It is possible to have a full career in technology, the nuggets will evolve to positions of architect.
content-bloc-3.value-2: Being at <b><listening></ b> the expectations of each person both internally and at our customers.
content-bloc-3.value-3: <b><Quality commitment></ b> Our clients have the right to experts to develop their project.
content-bloc-3.value-4: Develop <b><sharp expertise></ b> with the means to be truly effective.
content-bloc-3.value-5: <Valuing> the work of «techos» that requires a significant investment.

content-bloc-4.title: Labs
content-bloc-4.desc: ITArverne soutient l’Open Source en proposant des outils gratuits, librement accessibles avec un support technique.
content-bloc-4.bloc1-desc: Une application JS/HTML 5 qui permet de créer un site de type landing page avec le générateur yeoman.
content-bloc-4.bloc2-desc: Une application React permettant de partager une page sur le réseau LinkedIn.
content-bloc-4.bloc3-desc: Un plugin Grunt pour la librairie npm compress-images afin d'adapter la taille des images pour le web.
content-bloc-4.more: Et encore plein d'autres idées à vénir...

content-bloc-5.title: Who am I ?
content-bloc-5.text:
My name is David and I am from Auvergne where I decided to start my company. At work, I worked in different fields of activity but always related to the web.

The job of developer impassioned me and I appreciate meeting my customers in order to propose them the best architecture with a maintainable code always according to the respects of the current coding.

During these 10 years of experience, I was able to enrich my knowledge in the development but also in the business process. I master the Java, PHP and Python languages ​​on the back end as well as Reaction and Angular Js on the front end. As for the architecture part, I can intervene on the Docker, applications or just monolithic applications. find his account.
